children.description: A single child content element.This needs to be able to hold a ref.
children.description_zh: 单个子内容元素。这需要能够保存一个 ref。

addEndListener.description: Add a custom transition end trigger. Called with the transitioning DOM node and a done callback. Allows for more fine grained transition end logic. Note: Timeouts are still used as a fallback if provided.
addEndListener.description_zh: 添加自定义过渡结束触发器。使用转换的 DOM 节点和完成的回调调用。允许更细粒度的过渡结束逻辑。注意：如果提供超时，仍用作回退。

appear.description: Perform the enter transition when it first mounts if in is also true. Set this to false to disable this behavior.
appear.description_zh: 如果 in 也为 true，则在首次挂载时执行 enter 转换。将此项设置为 false 可禁用此行为。

easing.description: The transition timing function. You may specify a single easing or a object containing enter and exit values.
easing.description_zh: 转换时序函数。您可以指定单个缓动或包含 enter 和 exit 值的对象。

in.description: If true, the component will transition in.
in.description_zh: 如果为 true，则组件将转换。

timeout.description: The duration for the transition, in milliseconds. You may specify a single timeout for all transitions, or individually with an object.
timeout.description_zh: 转换的持续时间，以毫秒为单位。您可以为所有过渡指定单个超时，也可以单独指定一个对象超时。
timeout.type: number| { appear?: number, enter?: number, exit?: number }
